function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases due to prolonged lockdowns and close living conditions","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, strain on healthcare systems, and potential for new outbreaks","Mitigation":"Promote spacious and green housing design strategies, implement effective ventilation and air filtration systems, and enforce public health measures","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation and air filtration systems, smart building technologies for monitoring and controlling indoor environments, and telemedicine for remote healthcare services","People":"People living in close quarters, individuals in densely populated areas, and healthcare workers","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, public health authorities, and building developers"},{"Description":"Impact of pandemic policies on housing sector and green buildings","Impact":"Disruption in renting and housing policies, financial strain on landlords and renters, and challenges in implementing green building strategies","Mitigation":"Develop flexible housing policies, provide financial support to affected individuals, and promote sustainable and resilient green building practices","Technologies":"Digital platforms for remote transactions and communication, sustainable building materials and technologies, and financial support systems for impacted individuals","People":"Landlords, renters, policymakers, and green building professionals","Owner":"Policymakers, financial institutions, green building organizations, and community leaders"}]}
